answers.answer: Hello,Two possibilities are coming to my mind.First is of Raynaud’s disease and second is of peripheral vascular disease(maybe due to diabetes, atherosclerosis etc). I would suggest a physician’s evaluation and getting investigations like MRA(magnetic resonance angiography) and ANA titres to rule them out.Hope it helps.Take care and pls do keep me posted.

question: Hi,I went over on my left ankle earlier,  it was quite painful to begin with but its not as bad now.  Ive been able to walk on it however,  my left ankle now feels cold. It doesnt hurt to touch but the coldness is worrying as my right ankle is fine.Jodie
title: Ankle
